will be the Mountain View Internet juggernaut's new CEO starting April 4, and current CEO Eric Schmidt will be executive chairman, Eric Schmidt revealed in a post today on Google's blog. Co-founder Sergey Brin , meanwhile, has decided to devote his time and energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products. His title will be co-founder. He's an innovator and entrepreneur to the core, and this role suits him perfectly, Eric Schmidt said.`` As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated,'' Eric Schmidt wrote.`` So Larry Page , Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time how best to

the Internet's dominant gateway. The surprise shake-up announced Thursday appears to be driven by Eric Schmidt 's desire to assume more of a behind-the-scenes role as much as Larry Page 's personal ambition. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter account moments after Google dropped the bombshell that upstaged its fourth-quarter earnings.
